sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { Button, Container } from "semantic-ui-react"; import { FiMinus, FiPlus } from "react-icons/fi"; import { FaChevronLeft } from "react-icons/fa"; import { FiChevronDown } from "react-icons/fi"; import { getItemDetail, handleAddToCart } from "../redux/action/products"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import img1 from "../assets/imgs/shampoo1.jpg"; import img2 from "../assets/imgs/shampoo2.jpg"; import img3 from "../assets/imgs/shampoo3.jpg"; import img4 from "../assets/imgs/shampoo4.jpg"; import { getImage } from "../utils"; const ProductDetail = ({ getItemDetail, handleAddToCart, auth, loading, product: { item, error }, }) => { const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1); const { location } = useHistory(); let slug = location.pathname; let itemSlug = `/products/${slug.split("/").slice(3, 4).toString()}`; useEffect(() => { getItemDetail(itemSlug); }, [itemSlug]); document.title = item ? `${item.title} | Luxury Silk Online` : "Luxury Silk Online"; const history = useHistory(); const checkUser = (ref_code, qty) => { if (auth.token === null) { return history.push("/login"); } else { return handleAddToCart(ref_code, qty); } }; const showStepBtn = document.querySelectorAll(".show-step"); showStepBtn.forEach((btn) => { btn.addEventListener("click", (e) => { document.querySelectorAll(".step").forEach((step) => { step.classList.remove("show-text"); }); e.currentTarget.parentElement.parentElement.classList.toggle("show-text"); }); }); return ( <>

{item.title}

{item.description}

Safe for: Normal, Dry, Combination, Sensitive

When to use: Day or Night

KSh. {quantity * item.price}

{item.category}
{item?.weight}
{ quantity > 1 ? setQuantity(quantity - 1) : setQuantity(1); }} /> {quantity} setQuantity(quantity + 1)} />
{item.sold_out ? ( ) : ( )}

direction of use

On damp hair, separate into sections depending on volume and length. If hair is dry, spritz lightly with our "Miracle Mist" Daily Spritz to soften and dampen. Apply "Curl Magic!" Curling Gel liberally sections by section from root to tip.

Ingredients

Deionized Water, Glycerin, Carbomer Solution, Provitamin B5, Flax Seed Gel, Aloe Vera Gel, Sunflower Oil, Peppermint Leaves, Phenoxyethanol, Berries & Fruit Extract.

Description

directions of use:

On damp hair, separate into sections depending on volume and length. If hair is dry, spritz lightly with our{" "} "Miracle Mist" Daily Spritz to soften and dampen. Apply "Curl Magic!" Curling Gel liberally sections by section from root to tip. Curls will appear instantly! Let hair air-dry. Perfect for wash & go's, the curling sponge, rod-sets, finger coils, Bantu knots, twists, braids, and all other styles! If twist-outs or braid-outs, take down when completely dry for stronger definition.

unisex & great for all!

Women. Men. Kids. Naturals and Trasitioners. (This product is not suitable for chemically treated or relaxed hair.)

Ingredients:

Deionized Water, Glycerin, Carbomer Solution, Provitamin B5, Flax Seed Gel, Aloe Vera Gel, Sunflower Oil, Peppermint Leaves, Phenoxyethanol, Berries & Fruit Extract.

); }; const maptStateToProps = (state) => ({ product: state.product, auth: state.auth, loading: state.cart.loading, }); export default connect(maptStateToProps, { handleAddToCart, getItemDetail })( ProductDetail );
